nodes.text: The Thyferran Home Defense Corps was a defense force founded by the warlord Ysanne Isard during her rule of the planet Thyferra.

Built from components from the Imperial Navy and Army, including TIE/IN interceptors, plus volunteers from the Xucphra Corporation, the Home Defense Force was intended to protect Isard's control of the bacta-producing world during the Bacta War, during which the corps was led by Erisi Dlarit. After the Battle of Thyferra the THDC was disbanded and replaced by the Thyferran Aerospace Defense Force.
